sequence.notes: Condensation of Olivetol with a menthadiene derivative to form Δ9-THC. The screenshot title labels the product as 'Delta1-Tetrahydrocannabinol' but the drawn structure is consistent with Δ9-THC (6aR,10aR-cis). The stereochemistry of the reagent (a p-menthadiene derivative) and product (Δ9-THC) shown are consistent with each other (cis-fusion at bridgeheads).
